title: Make and answer calls on Android

steps.text: To make a call: Open the Phone app (green phone icon).
steps.tts: To make a call, open the Phone app. It has a green phone icon.

steps.text: Tap the keypad tab, type the number, then tap the green call button.
steps.tts: Tap the keypad tab, type the number, then tap the green call button.

steps.text: To answer a call: When the phone rings, swipe the green answer icon toward the center of the screen.
steps.tts: To answer a call, when the phone rings, swipe the green answer icon toward the center of the screen.

steps.text: To end a call: Tap the red hang-up button.
steps.tts: To end a call, tap the red hang-up button.
